lines.text: A man don't change much in five years and the breed is the worst.
Don't have to. All we want is a guide through the mountains.
That's what we want. What do he want?
I like Indian girls; it's those half-brothers I don't like.
Trench, he say Amigo should meet with you and ride out today. You're ready, yes?
I ain't goin' till tomorrow... maybe not then, either.
The only luck I've ever had in my life was when I met up with you.
